<template>
    <VideoBackground
    video-src="/assets/bg-video.mp4"
    poster="/images/home-poster.jpg"
    overlay-style="background: linear-gradient(120deg, rgba(43,16,85,0.9) 0%, rgba(117,151,222,0.7) 100%)">


  

    </VideoBackground>
</template>
  
  <script setup>
  import VideoBackground from '@/components/VideoBackground.vue'
  export default {
    name: 'HomeView'
  }
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  .home-view {
    min-height: 100vh;
    padding: 2rem;
    background: linear-gradient(120deg, #2b1055 0%, #7597de 100%);
    color: white;
    text-align: center;
  }
  </style>
